label: 傾城色三味線
本: The Cambridge History of Japan, Volume 4:  Early Modern Japan . Cambridge University Press . 1991
見出し読み: けいせいいろしゃみせん
説明文: (1701) [Guidebook to the pleasure quarter that] lists the names of the prostitues of the major official licensed quarters in eleven cities, reporting their rank, fee, and house (p. 745).
